title: Welcome to Harbor House Grill
content: Welcome to the team! In this lesson, you'll learn our culture, service philosophy, and what we expect from every team member on the floor.

title: Appearance & Uniform Standards
content: Team members must arrive in full uniform, clean and pressed. Hair should be neat, and shoes must be non-slip and polished.

title: Allergy Awareness
content: Always ask guests about allergies. Notify the kitchen and manager immediately if a guest mentions a dietary restriction.

title: Steps of Service
content: Greet guests within 30 seconds, offer beverages, explain specials, and check back within 2 minutes after food is delivered.
